definition: "cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
Red Army (1928-1937), predecessor of the PLA/(Soviet) Red Army (1917-1946)
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
geographical area of command/(PLA) military district

sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿边境活跃的唯一非停火武装是南掸邦军701部队。

sentences.english: Do you still recall the frightful night we crossed the Rio Grande?
sentences.chinese: 你还记得我们穿过边疆铁骑军，那个可怕的晚上吗？

sentences.english: Hannibal defeated the Romans in 216 BC.
sentences.chinese: 汉尼拔于公元前216年打败了罗马军。

sentences.english: A Burmese Army base exists in Sang Hka and the 6th battalion of the KIA is situated opposite it.
sentences.chinese: 缅军桑卡基地和克钦独立军第六营据点对面。

sentences.english: In a fine irony, the red shirts have now borrowed many of the PAD’s tactics.
sentences.chinese: 更具讽刺的是，红衫军现在借用了许多民盟的策略。

sentences.english: Sai Sheng Murng, deputy spokesman of the Shan State Army-South, supported the call for a Panglong-type conference.
sentences.chinese: 南掸邦军副发言人宰盛蒙，支持召开彬龙型协商会议。
他是一名北方军的侦察兵。

sentences.english: A unit of the SSA North's First Brigade attacked without provocation.
sentences.chinese: 北掸邦军第一旅的单位遭缅军突然袭击。

sentences.english: I was obviously a german in italian uniform .
sentences.chinese: 我显然是个披着意军制服的德国人。

sentences.english: Whe re have all the soldiers gone?
sentences.chinese: 那些军人们都到哪儿去了？

sentences.english: They are classic members - honorary members by definition - of China's new people's army of volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 他们是一群精英，是新“中国人民自愿军”志愿者。

sentences.english: The sergeant lay in his dirty long-sleeved underwear .
sentences.chinese: 军曹躺在那儿，只穿着一件脏了的长袖内衣。

sentences.english: But the casualties on the Burmese Army's side were not known.
sentences.chinese: 但是缅甸政府军方面是否有伤亡尚未可知。

sentences.english: Lynchburg surrendered to a Federal scouting party.
sentences.chinese: 林奇堡向联邦的侦查军投降。

sentences.english: There were rumours starting, from theIsraelites.
sentences.chinese: 以色列军开始互相谣传。

sentences.english: Good strong match, worthily for union armed force first soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 好强劲的对手，不愧为联合军第一战士。

definition: (in former times) upper, middle and lower army/army of right, center and left/(in modern times) the three armed services: Army, Navy and Air Force
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
